description:
Why get a boring, underpaying, low-potential job when YOU HAVE THE POWER RIGHT NOW TO EITHER EARN OR MAKE YOUR DREAM JOB!

"Hack Your Dream Job: Practical Steps for "Getting Ahead"' will help you achieve the following:

  • Identify what your dream job and lifestyle looks like,
  • Articulate the ONE thing you do better than most people in the world,
  • Set yourself up for a lifetime of success,
  • Capitalize on and create opportunities,
  • Continuously grow and get ahead for good!

I agree that there are many courses/books out there that aim to solve a similar problem, but entrepreneurs are still dealing with the same problem.

I'm Jared Kleinert, an 18 year old serial entrepreneur, Fortune 500 consultant, author-to-be, blogger, TEDx Speaker, and startup employee. Using a culmination of resources, methodologies, and my own experiences - I share my formula to hacking or creating your dream job.

This course is full of things like:

  • Methods to finding your "Zone of Genius"
  • Real-life examples from my past and other success stories
  • Email hacks and templates
  • Practical advice on building your network
  • Insight onto principles like the "80/20 rule" and "doing more work than paid for"
  • Book recommendations to get ahead even quicker
  • Job-earning advice for people of any age
  • Mentor exploration and experiential learning
  • Setting yourself up for sustainable success

Stop working a job or living a live of mediocrity. Like Rocky Balboa said to his son in the 6th Rocky movie..."You are better than that!"

Take this course to get a complete walkthrough on how to hack your dream job and get ahead in life.
title: Hack Your Dream Job: Practical Steps for "Getting Ahead"
